solution.text:
We know that \(Pressure=\frac{Force}{Unit\,area\,of\,surface}\)
When the straps of the bag are wider, the surface area increases.
As a result, the pressure decreases and it is easier to carry the bag.

content.text: It is easier to carry school bags having broad straps than those having narrow straps because _____ .

incorrect.text: the weight of the bag decreases
